source:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
A new rumor has the dwarves of Komra in a right tizzy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
トメラの村の噂好きのドワーフは、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the dig site watch.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_00<tab>コメラの村の外れにある坑道前にいる坑道の番人と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the dig site chief.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_01<tab>ドワーフ族の親方と話す

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Anogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_02<tab>アノッグと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_03<tab>Search for the automaton core.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD401 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the automaton core to Anogg.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_04<tab>アノッグに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD401 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_05<tab>Search for the mining lantern.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_05<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD501 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_06<tab>Deliver the mining lantern to the dig site chief.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_06<tab>ドワーフ族の親方に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD501 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_07<tab>Speak with the gossipy dwarf.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TODO_07<tab>トメラの村にいる噂好きのドワーフに報告

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_001<tab>You heard the latest rumor out of Komra? The strangest find in recent memory, though actual details as to what said find actually is have yet to emerge.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_001<tab>なあ、コメラの村の噂を知っているか？
何でも珍しい資源が発掘されたらしいのだが……
噂が本当かどうか確かめてきてくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_002<tab>If you do happen to come into any juicy tidbits, I'd be keen to hear 'em. The suspense is killing me here...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_002<tab>様子がわかったら、報告しにきてくれ。
うーん……どんな資源が発掘できるんだろう……？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_003<tab>Remember: I'm the one what put you on the scent! So if you learn any exciting secrets, you'd best share them with me! 'Tis only fair!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_003<tab>様子がわかったら、報告しにきてくれ。
うーん……どんな資源が発掘できるんだろう……？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_050<tab>I can neither confirm nor deny the existence of a new discovery of untold value that only a select few are allowed to see for themselves.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_050<tab>ここは現在、貴重な資源を発掘しているんだ。
関係者以外は立ち入り禁止だよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_051<tab>That said...there may come a time when I find myself utterly fascinated by that pile of rocks over there and would be completely oblivious to anyone attempting to sneak past...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_051<tab>でも……
まあ、時と場合によっては、ここを通してあげてもいい。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_052<tab>...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_052<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_053<tab>...You're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of the world, ain't you? Don't make me say it plain.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_053<tab>……ほら、大人だからわかるでしょう？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_054<tab>Wicked white! How bloody stupid are you!?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_054<tab>もう～物わかりの悪い人だな！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_055<tab>You─the imbecile─give me─the guard─ten thousand gil. Then you─the imbecile─get to walk past me─the guard─and see the amazing find. Got it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_055<tab>具体的に言うと10000ギルを、
アナタが、ボクに、くれればいいの。
そうすれば、ここを通してあげるって言ってるの！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q1_000_000<tab>Bribe the guard?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q1_000_000<tab>通行料を支払いますか？
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A1_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A1_000_002<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_057<tab>Then you do not get to pass. You go away! Good day, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_057<tab>じゃあいいよ。
ここは永久に通さないから！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_058<tab>Heh heh, about time you started playing by the rules...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_058<tab>へへっ……最初からそうやってカネを出していれば……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_059<tab>Lali-what in the blazing hells do you think you're doing man-ho!? Is that any way for a guard to behave? Is it!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_059<tab>コラアアアアアアアアッ！！！
ちゃんと番をしてろって言ってるだろうが！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_060<tab>N-N-No sir, Chief! Sir!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_060<tab>ヒイイッ！！　親方！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_061<tab>No rations for you tonight!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_061<tab>今日の晩飯は抜きだ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_062<tab>Chief, no! Mercy! Meeeeeercy!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_062<tab>ヒイイイッ……！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_063<tab>It's...<sniffle>...it's not fair, I tell you... A dwarf toils day in and day out for a pittance, only to try and make a little something extra on the side, and what does it get him... <sob>
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_063<tab>うううっ辛い……人にコキ使われるのは辛スギル……。
クソッ……カネだ……カネさえあれば……ボクは……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_064<tab>Right, well, anyway─bugger off. None may pass without the Chief's permission, which I know you haven't got.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_064<tab>というわけで、ここは立ち入り禁止だ……。
どうしても入りたきゃ、そこにいる「ドワーフ族の親方」に、
かけあってみるんだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_065<tab>Oh look, it's the sinner who cost me my dinner. Go hassle the chief if you want to go in, 'cause I sure as hells ain't letting you pass.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_065<tab>ここは立ち入り禁止だ。
どうしても入りたきゃ、そこにいる「ドワーフ族の親方」に、
かけあってみるんだな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_070<tab>No time for you, friend. We've our hands full with this latest find of ours...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_070<tab>貴重な資源が出土したのでな、
採掘現場への道は「坑道の番人」に見張らせているんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_100<tab>Wait, wait, don't tell me. I assume you came all this way to put in for the position? Sorry, but it's already been filled.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_100<tab>ところで……あんた、もしかして面接に応募してきた人か？
悪いが、実はもう決まっちまったんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q2_000_000<tab>ドワーフ族の親方に何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_001<tab>Came all this way for the what-now?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_001<tab>面接って何のこと？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_002<tab>You know what they say about assumptions...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A2_000_002<tab>この洞窟は？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_102<tab>Eh? Don't go playing silly buggers with me. The queer ruins we found deep in a cavern through a tunnel over there! The one filled with all kinds of machina? To the point we've started calling it a bloody machina graveyard?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_102<tab>最近この洞窟の奥で、未知の遺跡が発掘されたんだ。
珍しい機械が沢山出てくるから、
俺たちは「機械遺跡」って呼んでる。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_103<tab>Yes, well, we were looking to hire on another guard, but the position's since been filled by that fellow what tried to swindle you a moment ago.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_103<tab>それで、ここの門番を募集してたんだけどね。
ちょうど先週に決まったところなんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_104<tab>So you're out of luck, I'm afraid. But chin up, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Your time'll come round again soon enough.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_104<tab>まあ、こうやって経済を回すのは良い事だよな、うん。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_105<tab>Since you're here and still unemployed, mind delivering a message for me? It's for two younglings in Komra, Anogg and Konogg─sister and brother, twins. Fond of wearing white and black. Twin thing, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_105<tab>そうだ、ついでにひとつ伝言を頼みたいのだが……。
コメラの村に白い服と黒い服を着た、
「アノッグ」とコノッグという双子の姉弟がいてな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_100_105<tab>The message is as follows: “Lali-bleeding-ho! This is no place for children to be messing about! Stay far, far, far away, or else!” Got it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_100_105<tab>そいつらに、この遺跡はお前らのような、
子供の来る場所ではない！　と言っておいてくれないか？
仕事の邪魔をされて困っているんだ、よろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_110<tab>If I told you several times before you're not getting in, what makes you think I've since changed my mind? I mean, think about it...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_110<tab>悪いね。
ここは立入禁止なんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_115<tab>Anogg and Konogg, wearing white and black. You'll know 'em when you see 'em. And don't forget the lali-bleeding-ho!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_115<tab>「アノッグ」とコノッグという双子の姉弟だ。
コメラの村にいるはずだから、伝言を頼む。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_150<tab>Hm? You got business with us?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_150<tab>ん？　何か用か？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_100_150<tab>...The chief put you up to this? And you <var 1A 02 /var>agreed<var 1A 01 /var>? Haven't you got anything better to do with your time?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_100_150<tab>ふむふむ……ドワーフ族の親方から伝言？
今はそんなことにかまっている場合ではないのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_151<tab>Wait...those garments...that quiet confidence...those powerful neck muscles sculpted by a lifetime of nodding...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_151<tab>あ……もしや、この人は……

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_152<tab>(This is that sinner everyone's been talking about, Sister! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var>'s the guileless fool we've been waiting for! The perfect patsy!)
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_152<tab>噂に聞く「ヨソ者」のようだよ、アノッグ。
コイツを利用しようよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_153<tab>(Good thinking, Brother. Let's get right to it, then!)
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_153<tab>おお、そうだな。
コノッグは賢いな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_154<tab>Ah... Ahem! You wouldn't happen to be that kindly stranger everyone likes and adores? You are, aren't you!? Perhaps you would be willing to do us a teensy little favor? Of course you would!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_154<tab>あー、コホン。
キミはどうやらヨソ者のようだが……
ちょっと頼まれてくれないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_155<tab>My brother and I are conducting some highly secret research at the moment, but we've hit a dead end. To continue, we need to get our hands on an automaton core...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_155<tab>ワタシ達姉弟は、とある秘密の研究をしている。
その研究に必要な「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD401 /var>」を取ってきて欲しいんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q3_000_000<tab>アノッグに何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A3_000_001<tab>...So I'm to be your patsy?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A3_000_001<tab>なぜ？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A3_000_002<tab>Good luck with that.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A3_000_002<tab>自分で取りに行かないのか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_157<tab>Oh, don't be silly! Everyone knows you're the soul of generosity! A sinner who cannot help but render aid to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> fellow sinner in their hour of need! Not for fame or fortune or any other reward, but simply for the joy of it! Am I wrong?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_157<tab>ボク達は知ってるんだ。
この世界のヨソ者は「お使い」が大好きだって。
困ってる人を見ていると助けずにはいられないらしいじゃないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q4_000_000<tab>アノッグとコノッグを助けますか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A4_000_001<tab>...This is another one of those moments where it really doesn't matter what I have to say, isn't it?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A4_000_001<tab>助ける

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A4_000_002<tab>Oh, sod this.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A4_000_002<tab>助けない

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_159<tab>How rude!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_159<tab>ちぇっ、ケチー！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_160<tab>So rude!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_160<tab>ケチー！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_161<tab>But despite your vehement refusal, deep down we both know you cannot help but aid us in our endeavor. 'Tis your nature. We will pretend that you agreed without a fuss and that will be the end of it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_161<tab>でも、そんなつれない事を言いながらも、
実は助けたくて仕方がないのだろう？
ワタシは何でもお見通しなのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_162<tab>Now you're on the trolley.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_162<tab>さすが、噂に聞く旅人。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_163<tab>The core we require is being stored with other sundry materials on the cliffs above us. Once you have it, bring it to my sister.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_163<tab>ではさっそく、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD401 /var>」の在り処を教えよう。
村外れに資材置き場があるから、こっそり仕入れてくるんだ。
手に入れたら、「アノッグ」に渡してくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_165<tab>As soon as you have that automaton core, bring it to me straightaway.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_165<tab>お使いを頼んだからな。
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD401 /var>」だぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_170<tab>Don't dally, sinner! We need that core for our research!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_170<tab>お使いを頼んだからな。
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD401 /var>」があるのは、村外れの資材置き場だぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_180<tab>Can't you see we're in the middle of a very important conversation?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_180<tab>今は取り込み中だぞ。
「アノッグ」と作戦会議をしているのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_200<tab>You gave 'em the ol' lali-bleeding-ho, did you? Hope they took it to heart.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_200<tab>まさか、アノッグとコノッグが、
迷惑をかけているんじゃなかろうな？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_250<tab>Ahh, there's the sinner now!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_250<tab>おお、ヨソ者よ。
帰ってきたか。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_251<tab>And is that the core I spy in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> hot little hands?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_251<tab>ちゃんと「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD401 /var>」を、
手に入れてきたようじゃないか。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_252<tab>Heh heh heh, brilliant! All we've got to do is sell this for a small fortune, and then we'll be one step closer to seeing our plans for world domination to fruition...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_252<tab>では、お小遣いをやろう！
これで、ワレワレの世界征服が一歩前進し……

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_253<tab>(Oi, Anogg! Lali-nay on the domination-ho!)
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_253<tab>シッ、ダメだよアノッグ。
ボク達だけの秘密だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_254<tab>(Oh, right! That was a close one, Brother!)
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_254<tab>おお、そうだったな。
賢い弟よ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_255<tab>Now then, for our next request...
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_255<tab>では、次なる「お使い」を頼んでやろう……

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_256<tab>Lali-what in the hells are you two up to-ho!? If you're even thinking of taking advantage of this good sinner, I'll tan both your hides and toss you from the top of White Oil Falls! Now get you gone!
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_256<tab>コラアアッ！！
また、人様に迷惑かけてるのか！？
三枚に下ろして海に叩き込むぞッ！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_257<tab>(-Anogg and Konogg-)Sir, yes, sir!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_257<tab>(-アノッグとコノッグ-)ヒイイイッ！！！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_258<tab>Sorry about that. They don't know any better, on account of them being all on their own. No parents.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_258<tab>……すまないな。
あいつら、親がいなくてね。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_259<tab>They've lost more than most, you could say. More than anyone ever should.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_259<tab>あんたに、いろいろ失礼があったかもしれないな……
許してくれ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_260<tab>Anyway, I've been meaning to ask. Everyone says you're the soul of generosity─a sinner who cannot help but render aid to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> fellow sinner in their hour of need. Not for fame or fortune or any other reward, but simply for the joy of it. Am I wrong?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_260<tab>……ところで、あんたは「ヨソ者」なんだろう？
ヨソ者は「お使い」が大好きらしいじゃないか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q5_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_Q5_000_000<tab>ドワーフ族の親方に何と言う？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A5_000_002<tab>I'd swear you just repeated nearly word for word what those two...never mind.
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_A5_000_002<tab>あの姉弟からも同じことを言われた

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_262<tab>We're short a lantern at the dig site. Should be another in the cave just outside of the village. Mind going and fetching it for me? 'Course you don't.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_262<tab>現場で「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD501 /var>」が足りてなくてな。
村の外の洞窟を探せば見つかるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_263<tab>Once you've got it, bring it to me back at the dig. Oh, and don't worry─I'll see you compensated for the trouble.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_263<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD501 /var>」を見つけたら、遺跡の入口の、
坑道の番人がいた場所まで持ってきてくれ。
もちろん報酬は払う、頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_265<tab>Got that lantern for me? No? It should be in the cave just outside of town.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_265<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD501 /var>」を見つけたら、遺跡の入口の、
坑道の番人がいた場所まで持ってきてくれ。
村の外の洞窟を探せば見つかるはずだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_350<tab>There you are. I presume that lantern you're holding's for yours truly?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_350<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8FD501 /var>」は手に入ったか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_351<tab>Much obliged. Here─a little something for your trouble.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_351<tab>おお、コレコレ。
助かるよ、報酬はコレだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_352<tab>Never let it be said a dwarf of character doesn't pay his debts. Anyway, if we've nothing else to discuss...
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_352<tab>さて、これであんたもカネを稼ぐことができて満足だろう。
ほかに用事がなければ、俺も仕事に戻るが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_353<tab>Just let us pass already!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_353<tab>そこの遺跡に、入れておくれよぉ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_354<tab>We want to see the ruins! Please please please please please!?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_354<tab>入れておくれよぉ！

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_355<tab>No, no, no, no, no. It's dangerous and off-limits and even if I were the sort of man who could be bribed─which I'm not─I'd be shocked if you two had anything valuable enough for me to risk my neck looking the other way.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_355<tab>ダメだって言ってるだろ。
ここは危ないから立ち入り禁止だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_356<tab>Why are you and everyone else so bloody obsessed with trying to get a look at the cavern filled with mysterious machina anyway? It's just a bloody scrap heap, isn't it?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_356<tab>まったく……どうしてこんな遺跡に皆興味を持つんだ？
もしかして、機械以外にも、スゴイお宝が……？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_357<tab>No no─it's so much more! Based on our research, we have reason to believe that those ruins contain─
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_357<tab>ワレワレの発見によれば、あの遺跡の中には……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_358<tab>(Hush, Sister! How many times must you nearly give the game away!? It's supposed to be our secret!)
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_358<tab>シッ、ダメだよアノッグ。
ボク達だけの秘密だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_359<tab>(Oh, yes, right. Right. It's just so hard sometimes to contain my enthusiasm...)
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_359<tab>そうだったね、コノッグ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_360<tab>Nothing. These ruins contain nothing of value whatsoever. We shall leave you to your affairs, honorable guard sir, and bid thee farewell.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_360<tab>という事で、何でも無いです。
ボク達は平気です、ハイ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_361<tab>Honestly, I'm beginning to hope that there really is nothing of value in there, for all the trouble it's causing. But as I was about to say─if we've got nothing else to discuss, then you'd best be on your way. It's dangerous to wander about an active dig, and I don't want anyone getting hurt.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_361<tab>……ったく、アイツらときたら……。
あんたも用事がないなら「機械遺跡」には近づくんじゃねぇぞ。
ケガでもされたら大変だからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_370<tab>What does it matter to you if we go through? It's not like it's your find! You have nothing to lose!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_ANOGG_000_370<tab>クソッ……こんなところで油を売っている場合では……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_371<tab>You really must let us through. It's a matter of the utmost importance!
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_KONOGG_000_371<tab>ワレワレはこの遺跡に用があるのだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_372<tab>...What in the hells are you two on about?
target: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_372<tab>この双子、さっきから何をブツブツ言っているんだ？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_400<tab>Poked around Komra, did you? Learn anything about that big find?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_400<tab>おお、コメラの村からやっと帰ってきたか。
で、珍しい資源の情報は何かわかったか？

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_401<tab>A machine graveyard, eh? Interesting, interesting... This could be the beginning of a great and grand adventure. Or an utterly nonsensical one─though that does have its appeal on occasion, I'll allow.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_RUMORSDWARF03671_000_401<tab>なるほど、「機械遺跡」とやらに入れてもらえなかった、と。
そこでいったいどんな資源が発掘できるんだろう……。
ともあれ、ご苦労だった。これはお礼だ。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_410<tab>Folks ought to keep busy, that's my motto. Idle hands are the fae's playthings.
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_DWARFMASTER03671_000_410<tab>人間、忙しくしてるのが一番だ。
ヒマだとロクな事考えやしねぇからな。

source: TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_411<tab>Wicked white, if you start pestering me like those twins to get inside... <sigh> I tell you, what's the point of being a guard if you can't profit off it? Why would anyone ever take this job?
target:
TEXT_LUCKYA003_03671_TUNNELGUARD03671_000_411<tab>ここは立ち入り禁止だよ。
はぁ……カネが欲しいなあ。
